Template.Name: All Systems Go
Template.Description: This is a template description, and not a real perk. Increase your running speed by 1%/2%/3% while unarmed.

ID_PK_KillInhibit.Name: Crush Morale
ID_PK_KillInhibit.Description: When you Knockdown or Kill a teen all other active teens will become Inhibited for the next 9/12/16 seconds. This Perk can only activate once every 60 seconds.

ID_PK_PickupDrop.Name: Pocket Punch
ID_PK_PickupDrop.Description: When you Injure a teen that is carrying a Pickup, they will drop it on the ground. This Perk can only activate once every 300/200/100 seconds.

ID_PK_ScreamRange.Name: Screecher
ID_PK_ScreamRange.Description: The monster's Scream shockwave range is increased by 12%/24%/36%.

ID_PK_Eradicator_ModeSwap_SpeedBoost.Name: Nitro Booster
ID_PK_Eradicator_ModeSwap_SpeedBoost.Description:
+ After switching into Vehicle mode you will move an additional 200% faster for 2 seconds.
- There is now an 18 second cooldown on Mode Swap after exiting Vehicle mode and Deathwire can no longer enter Vehicle mode while Recalibrating.

ID_PK_Eradicator_ElectricSurge_Expose.Name: Triangulation Matrix
ID_PK_Eradicator_ElectricSurge_Expose.Description:
+ While Teens are Shocked they will also be Exposed.
- Deathwire may only store 1 use of Electric Surge at a time.

ID_PK_Eradicator_ScannerBeam_Armed.Name: Armament Calibration
ID_PK_Eradicator_ScannerBeam_Armed.Description:
+ The time that armed teens are Exposed by the Scanner Beam is increased by 30%.
- The time that unarmed teens are Exposed by the Scanner Beam is reduced by 30%.

ID_PK_HideSense.Name: Hidden Agenda
ID_PK_HideSense.Description: 4 seconds/2 seconds/0 seconds after a teen leaves a hiding place the aura of the hiding place will be revealed to you for 6 seconds

ID_PK_DollMaster_Summon_LongDuration.Name: Frolic
ID_PK_DollMaster_Summon_LongDuration.Description:
+ The total time a Doll can be possessed is increased by 25%.
- The focusing time required to begin possessing a Doll is increased by 50%

ID_PK_Vigilance.Name: Ambush
ID_PK_Vigilance.Description: When a Blunder occurs while a teen is crafting, that teen will be Exposed for 3 seconds/5 seconds/7 seconds.

ID_PK_DollMaster_Trap_ImprovedDetect.Name: Tricky
ID_PK_DollMaster_Trap_ImprovedDetect.Description:
+ A Inhibited will twitch and its icon will turn Orange when it detects a Inhibited teen within 11 meters of it.
- The maximum number of Inhibited that can be placed on the map simultaneously is reduced by 1.

ID_PK_EvilPickupUseReveal.Name: Deadly Bite
ID_PK_EvilPickupUseReveal.Description: When a teen uses a Candy Bar, you will be Alerted and they will be Exposede for 2 seconds/3.5 seconds/ 5 seconds. This can only activate once every 150 seconds/90 secpmds/30 seconds.

ID_PK_DollMaster_Teleport_NoTargeting.Name: Outcast
ID_PK_DollMaster_Teleport_NoTargeting.Description:
* Doll Teleport will no longer use a selected Doll Trap, but will instead always target the Doll Trap that is farthest away from the Doll Master.
+ Doll Teleport focusing time is reduced by 15%.

ID_PK_Eradicator_ElectricSurge_Inhibit.Name: Neural Disruptor
ID_PK_Eradicator_ElectricSurge_Inhibit.Description:
+ When Teens are Shocked they will also be Inhibited for 20 seconds.
- The Overcharged status lasts an additional 1.5 seconds.

ID_PK_Eradicator_ModeSwap_FastCharge.Name: Swift Cycle Module
ID_PK_Eradicator_ModeSwap_FastCharge.Description:
+ Decreases the focusing time required to enter Vehicle mode by 40%.
- The movement speed of Vehicle mode is reduced by 25%.

ID_PK_Eradicator_ScannerBeam_WideArea.Name: Wide-Range Optics
ID_PK_Eradicator_ScannerBeam_WideArea.Description:
+ The area scanned by the Scanner Beam is increased by 25%.
- The cooldown of the Scanner Beam is increased by 15%.

ID_PK_Eradicator_ModeSwap_FastSurgeCoold.Name: Charging Belt
ID_PK_Eradicator_ModeSwap_FastSurgeCoold.Description:
+ While in Vehicle mode your Electric Surge cooldown recovers 50% faster.
- While in Assault mode your Electric Surge cooldown recovers 50% slower.

ID_PK_Eradicator_ScannerBeam_FastMoving.Name: Sentry Rigging
ID_PK_Eradicator_ScannerBeam_FastMoving.Description:
+ Deathwire's movement speed while charging the Scanner Beam is increased by 200%.
- Deathwire can no longer use the Scanner Beam while in Assault mode.

ID_PK_Eradicator_ElectricSurge_ExtraSurg.Name: Stigma Coil
ID_PK_Eradicator_ElectricSurge_ExtraSurg.Description:
+ You may now store up to 3 uses of Electric Surge at a time.
- Electric Surge no longer affects unarmed Teens.

ID_PK_DollMaster_Summon_JumpRefresh.Name: Rebound
ID_PK_DollMaster_Summon_JumpRefresh.Description:
+ When a Doll becomes possessed, the Jump cooldown is set to 2 seconds.
- The amount of time a Doll can be possessed is reduced by 20%.

ID_PK_DollMaster_Trap_ExtraTraps.Name: Offspring
ID_PK_DollMaster_Trap_ExtraTraps.Description:
+ The maximum number of Doll Traps that can be placed on the map simultaneously is increased by 1.
- The distance at which Doll Traps become Alarmed is reduced by 90%.

ID_PK_DollMaster_Teleport_DoubleTeleport.Name: Slippery
ID_PK_DollMaster_Teleport_DoubleTeleport.Description:
+ A second Doll Teleport can now be performed within 4 seconds of the initial Doll Teleport before going on cooldown. If the second Doll Teleport is performed, a Doll Trap will be left behind.
- The focusing time required to Doll Teleport is increased by 25%.

ID_PK_DollMaster_Summon_ExtraJumps.Name: Double Cross
ID_PK_DollMaster_Summon_ExtraJumps.Description:
+ A possessed Doll can store 1 additional use of the Jump ability.
- A possessed Doll's base run speed is reduced by 2%.

ID_PK_DollMaster_Trap_TripPersist.Name: Haunted
ID_PK_DollMaster_Trap_TripPersist.Description:
+ A Doll Trap will no longer self-destruct at the end of the Alarmed state.
Teens will be Exposed while disarming a Doll Trap and for 3 seconds after the disarm is completed.
The cooldown on Doll Possession is reduced by 25%.
- Doll Trap icons will no longer change color when teens are nearby.
Remove Trap can't be used while Doll Possession is on cooldown.

ID_PK_DollMaster_Teleport_HitRefresh.Name: Aggressive
ID_PK_DollMaster_Teleport_HitRefresh.Description:
+ If the Doll Master strikes a teen within 8 seconds of performing a Doll Teleport, the Doll Teleport cooldown is reduced to 12 seconds.
- The base Doll Teleport cooldown time is increased by 15%.

ID_PK_CrowdReveal.Name: Easy Target
ID_PK_CrowdReveal.Description: When an active teen more than 28 meters from you gets within 10 meters of 2 other active teens, you will be alerted and these teens will be Exposed for 4 seconds. This can only activate once every 120 seconds/90 seconds/60 seconds.

ID_PK_Gluttony.Name: All Consuming
ID_PK_Gluttony.Description: Fuel your Rage 15% faster/30% faster/45% faster when Feasting.

ID_PK_Lethality.Name: Lethal Weapon
ID_PK_Lethality.Description: Increases the Life loss inflicted when teens are Injured by your Basic Attack by 4%/8%/12%of the base amount.

ID_PK_Toad_AcidArmor_HitBonus.Name: Toxic
ID_PK_Toad_AcidArmor_HitBonus.Description:
+ The Life loss inflicted when a teen is hit while W.A.R.T. is Armored is increased by 8% of the base amount.
- After Acid Armor is used, Leap cannot be used for 3 seconds.

ID_PK_Toad_Leap_FastCooldown.Name: Kinetic
ID_PK_Toad_Leap_FastCooldown.Description:
+ The Leap base cooldown is reduced by 25%.
- The Leap will no longer create a Shockwave after landing.

ID_PK_Toad_Echolocation_Deafen.Name: Deafen
ID_PK_Toad_Echolocation_Deafen.Description:
+ When Echolocation is used, the teens are now affected by the Deafened status for 4.5 seconds.
- When Echolocation is used, it will cancel the Armored status and the Acid Armor power can't be used for the next 4.5 seconds.

ID_PK_Toad_Leap_ImprovedStagger.Name: Bombshell
ID_PK_Toad_Leap_ImprovedStagger.Description:
+ The Leap's shockwave radius is increased by 25% and the Stagger effect duration by 10%.
- The base cooldown of the Leap is increased by 35%.

ID_PK_Toad_AcidArmor_FastCooldown.Name: Immune
ID_PK_Toad_AcidArmor_FastCooldown.Description:
+ The Acid Armor's base cooldown is reduced by 15%.
- If Acid Armor is shattered by a weapon then all of W.A.R.T's powers are placed on cooldown.

ID_PK_Toad_Echolocation_EchoWeaponDetect.Name: Detect
ID_PK_Toad_Echolocation_EchoWeaponDetect.Description:
When Echolocation is used, the Afterimages of armed teens will appear in a different color than unarmed teens.
- Echolocation's base cooldown is increased by 25%.

ID_PK_Toad_Leap_FastSpeed.Name: Throttle
ID_PK_Toad_Leap_FastSpeed.Description:
+ Movement speed during the Leap when not taking weapon damage is increased by 24%.
- The activation time of the Leap is increased by 30%.

ID_PK_Toad_AcidArmor_SpeedBonus.Name: Fluid
ID_PK_Toad_AcidArmor_SpeedBonus.Description:
+ The base speed at which the W.A.R.T can move while Armored and not taking damage is increased by 5%.
- The activation time of Acid Armor is increased by 20%.

ID_PK_Toad_Echolocation_EchoCloneMotion.Name: Mimic
ID_PK_Toad_Echolocation_EchoCloneMotion.Description:
+ When Echolocation is used, a trail of Afterimages that trace the movement for the next 1.3 seconds will be created instead of a single Afterimage.
- The focusing time to use Echolocation is increased by 30%.

ID_PK_ExtendSubdued.Name: Scream Fest
ID_PK_ExtendSubdued.Description: Teens affected by the monster's Scream are Disrupted for 12% longer/24% longer/36% longer.

ID_PK_Ferocity.Name: Ruthless
ID_PK_Ferocity.Description: Recover from a missed attack 13% faster/26% faster/39% faster.

ID_PK_ProneReveal.Name: Body Count
ID_PK_ProneReveal.Description: When any Prone teen within 20 meters/20 meters/28 meters of you is moving/moving or controlling a Spectral/literally existing they will be Exposed.

ID_PK_Werewolf_Berserk_LongDuration.Name: Nightmare
ID_PK_Werewolf_Berserk_LongDuration.Description:
+ Berserk duration is increased by 35%.
- The speed boost gained from Berserk is reduced by 15%.

ID_PK_Werewolf_Howl_FastCooldown.Name: Rabid
ID_PK_Werewolf_Howl_FastCooldown.Description:
+ Howl cooldown is reduced by 15%.
- The maximum range of Howl is reduced by 10%.

ID_PK_Werewolf_Sense_ExtendRange.Name: Greedy
ID_PK_Werewolf_Sense_ExtendRange.Description:
+ When Hunting, the range at which teens can be detected is increased by 25%.
- When Hunting, the frequency response of the Heartbeat sound when teens are nearby is reduced by 25%.

ID_PK_Werewolf_Sense_MarkTeen.Name: Obsessed
ID_PK_Werewolf_Sense_MarkTeen.Description:
+ The duration of Hunting depletes 40% slower while no teens are detected.
- The duration of Hunting depletes 30% faster while teens are detected.

ID_PK_Werewolf_Howl_Stagger.Name: Thunder
ID_PK_Werewolf_Howl_Stagger.Description:
+ Howl now Deafens teens for 4.5 seconds.
- The cooldown of Howl is increased by 20%.

ID_PK_Werewolf_Berserk_InstantRefresh.Name: Grim
ID_PK_Werewolf_Berserk_InstantRefresh.Description:
+ If an active Berserk expires without the Werewolf hitting a teen or being struck by a weapon, the cooldown remaining on Berserk is set to 2.5 second.
- An active Berserk will cancel when Howl or Hunt is used, and using Berserk will cancel an active Hunt.

ID_PK_Werewolf_Berserk_HitPersist.Name: Vicious
ID_PK_Werewolf_Berserk_HitPersist.Description:
+ If you Knockdown a teen while Berserk is active, it will remain active for 9.5 seconds instead of being cancelled.
- The cooldown of Berserk is increased by 20%.

ID_PK_Werewolf_Howl_Reaction.Name: Savage
ID_PK_Werewolf_Howl_Reaction.Description:
+ For 1.5 seconds after escaping taking damage from a weapon, gain the Savage status, reducing the focus time required to use Howl by 80%.
- When not affected by the Savage status, the focus time required to use Howl is increased by 33%.

ID_PK_Werewolf_Sense_Toggle.Name: Chronic
ID_PK_Werewolf_Sense_Toggle.Description:
+ Hunting will no longer detect teens that are Prone.
- Whenever you Knockdown a teen, Hunt cannot be used for the next 22 seconds.

ID_PK_Motivator.Name: Team Spirit
ID_PK_Motivator.Description:
Other teens within 12 meters of you gain a 6%/9%/12% speed increase to Healing, Reviving, Resurrecting or Disarming actions.
This bonus does not stack witha dditional users of this Perk.

ID_PK_TeenVision.Name: Friend Zone
ID_PK_TeenVision.Description: While within 13 meters/20 meters/27 meters of another teen, their aura is visible to you.

ID_PK_Spry.Name: Lightning Fast
ID_PK_Spry.Description: The duration of the speed boost gained after being Injured by the monster is increased by 10%/17%/24%.

ID_PK_SlowDying.Name: Never Say Die
ID_PK_SlowDying.Description: The rate at which you lose Life while Prone is reduced by 9%/18%/27%.

ID_PK_Hardy.Name: Born Tough
ID_PK_Hardy.Description: Gives an additional 8%/16%/24% Life for the first 180 seconds of a match.

ID_PK_KeepWeapon.Name: Vice Grip
ID_PK_KeepWeapon.Description: Once per match, if you are knocked Prone while you have a weapon equipped you will not lose it. This perk only becomes active after 2 other teens/1 other teen/0 other teens have/has died.

ID_PK_CrouchMaster.Name: Low Profile
ID_PK_CrouchMaster.Description: While unarmed, your movement speed when Crouching is increased by 25%/50%/75%.

ID_PK_FailMaster.Name: Silent Shadow
ID_PK_FailMaster.Description: When a crafting skill check is failed, there is a 50%/75%/100% chance the Blunder will be prevented and the monster will not be alerted.

ID_PK_Augur.Name: Evil Eye
ID_PK_Augur.Description: The monster's aura will be visible to you for 2.5 seconds/3 seconds/3.5 seconds after Transforming/Transforming and while Disintegrating/Transforming, while Disintegrating, and while Stunned.

ID_PK_EssenceVision.Name: Head Trip
ID_PK_EssenceVision.Description: While controlling a Spectral, you will now see the aura of Luma within 13 meters/26 meters/at any distance of/from you and the movement speed of your Spectral is increased by 4%/12%/20%.

ID_PK_PickupVision.Name: Street Smart
ID_PK_PickupVision.Description: You can see the aura of Pickups and most Searchable objects within 5 meters/10 meters/15 meters.

ID_PK_MedkitMaster.Name: Quick Fix
ID_PK_MedkitMaster.Description: Increases the speed at which you can Heal yourself with a Med Kit by 6%/10%/14%. While Injured the distance at which you can see the aura of Med Kit stations is increased to 16 meters/20 meters/24 meters.

ID_PK_HealMaster.Name: Healing Hands
ID_PK_HealMaster.Description: Increases the speed at which you perform Healing on others by 6%/12%/18%.

ID_PK_InjuryVision.Name: Secret Admirer
ID_PK_InjuryVision.Description: When a teen is Injured, their aura becomes visible to you for the next 3 seconds/6 seconds/9 seconds.

ID_PK_ReviveMaster.Name: Magic Touch
ID_PK_ReviveMaster.Description:
Increases the speed at which you revive a prone teen by 10%/20%/30%.

A revived teen will regain 2%/4%/6% of their total base Life. This effect will not stack when assisted by other users of this perk.

ID_PK_CraftMaster.Name: CraftMaster
ID_PK_CraftMaster.Description: Each time another teen dies during a match CraftMaster gains a token. Each token increases the speed at which you craft weapons by 2%/4%/6%.

ID_PK_StationVision.Name: Station Vision
ID_PK_StationVision.Description: Increases the distance at which you can see the indicator of crafting stations by 50%/100%/at any distance. The aura of stations that are in use by another teen will flash.

ID_PK_Multitasker.Name: Multitasker
ID_PK_Multitasker.Description: While crafting a weapon at a station, the loss of crafting progress at other stations is reduced by 25%/50%/75%.
